![kerbal_wars_by_terrencep-d8q4mbs.jpg](http://orig05.deviantart.net/5ccd/f/2015/108/9/9/kerbal_wars_by_terrencep-d8q4mbs.jpg)

- - - Updated - - -

I also made this out of boredom

![kerbal_flight_by_terrencep-d8pcrs1.jpg](http://pre11.deviantart.net/8609/th/pre/i/2015/101/8/4/kerbal_flight_by_terrencep-d8pcrs1.jpg)

If anyone has any ideas they want to see drawn feel free to post them. I'm always interested in hearing wacky and fun ideas for drawings and since this is in ksp forums let's try to involve kerbals. All ideas will be considered but whichever ones inspire me will probably get drawn by either me or someone else. Keep it PG.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T15:25:26Z" title="04/27/2015 03:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by PsykoticCreations**
